net.tridentsdk.util

Class TridentLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingCollection<TridentLogger>
        • net.tridentsdk.util.TridentLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<TridentLogger>, Collection<TridentLogger>, Registry<TridentLogger>

    @ThreadSafe
 @Policy(value="Ensure initialization ASAP in main class")
public final class TridentLogger
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingCollection<TridentLogger>
implements Registry<TridentLogger>
    Logger for Trident, automatically obtains the correct logger for the class
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

      • error

        public void error(Throwable throwable)
        Formats a throwable to be logged to the console

        By default this is not needed as the concurrent which runs almost all operations by default have a set uncaught exception handler

        Parameters:
        throwable - the error to log
